section.title: item groups creating new Item Group
section.para: To create a new Item Group, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: Create your Item Groups using a logical, hierarchical structure. This will make it easier to retrieve Item Group information in the future.

section.para: When creating a new Item Group, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter a unique name for the Item Group.
Enter a description to further identify the Item Group.
Selecting this option will include the group in the Product Catalog
A list of other Parent Groups that belong to the Item Group defined in this window. Including another Parent Group will also include that Parent Group's Member Items.
Click to remove the selected Parent Group from the Item Group. Once deleted, it will no longer display under Parent Groups.
Select a new Parent Group to include in the Item Group.
Select to apply the selected Item Group as a Parent Group. It will be listed under Parent Groups.

Display lists Member Items of the Item Group.
Only Member Items of the Item Group defined in this window will be listed under Member Items.
Click to remove a Member Item from the Item Group. Once deleted, it will no longer display under Member Items.
Enter an Item Number to be included as a Member Item in the Item Group. The Item description will be displayed underneath the Item Number.
The Entered Item's Unit of Measure will be displayed.
Select to apply the entered Item as a Member Item. It will be listed under Member Items.
